Class Fireworks

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fireworks

  • public class Fireworks
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to store the firework data and info.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fireworks(java.lang.String gameType)
      Constructor for the firework stacks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFirework(char colour)
      Increments a given firework by 1
      boolean checkBuildValid(Card inputCard)
      Checks if a given card can be added to the stack (valid for default and extended gameTypes)
      boolean[] checkBuildValidWild(Card inputCard)
      Checks if a given card can be added to any of the stacks (valid for wild mode only)
      java.util.HashMap getFireworks()
      Returns the HashMap containing firework data
      int stackSize(char colour)
      Purpose: returns the size of the requested fireworks stack

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fireworks

        public Fireworks(java.lang.String gameType)
        Constructor for the firework stacks. Initializes all fireworks to 0, adds an extra if playing extended.
        Parameters:
        gameType - the game type

    • Method Detail

      • addFirework

        public void addFirework(char colour)
        Increments a given firework by 1
        Parameters:
        colour - The colour of the stack to increase

      • stackSize

        public int stackSize(char colour)
        Purpose: returns the size of the requested fireworks stack
        Parameters:
        colour - the colour whose stack size is needed
        Returns:
        the size of the firework stack

      • checkBuildValid

        public boolean checkBuildValid(Card inputCard)
        Checks if a given card can be added to the stack (valid for default and extended gameTypes)
        Parameters:
        inputCard - The card to check against the stack
        Returns:
        true if the card can be played. false otherwise.

      • checkBuildValidWild

        public boolean[] checkBuildValidWild(Card inputCard)
        Checks if a given card can be added to any of the stacks (valid for wild mode only)
        Parameters:
        inputCard - The card to check against the stack
        Returns:
        an Array of booleans that are true if the card can be played on the respective stack. false otherwise.

      • getFireworks

        public java.util.HashMap getFireworks()
        Returns the HashMap containing firework data
        Returns:
        The firework data
